text: Jessé Gomes da Silva Filho, known professionally as Zeca Pagodinho (born February 4, 1959), is a Brazilian singer-songwriter working in the genres of samba and pagode. ==See also== *Rita Lee *Sérgio Mendes *Latino *Kaoma Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian singer- songwriters
title: Zeca Pagodinho
